checkTranslation.LABEL_FILTER_RECORD: Filter Record Which Contains The JSON Data
checkTranslation.LABEL_SELECT_A_MODULE: Select a module wich contains JSON field
checkTranslation.LABEL: Label
checkTranslation.TOOLTIP_DATASOURCE: Select the 'Record Containing JSON Data' option if all the records to be rendered are in a single record of a certain field of the module.'Count of Records Across Module' Dataset lets you select the module and it displays the count of records for the module based on the filters given
checkTranslation.TOOLTIP_JSONDATA: It allows you to select single record that contains a JSON object.
checkTranslation.TOOLTIP_LIVEDATA: It allows you to get live count.
checkTranslation.TOOLTIP_JSON_SELECT_MODULE: Select the Module which has JSON data
checkTranslation.TOOLTIP_JSON_TYPE_DATA: Select the Field which has the data, only json type fields will be available in the dropdown
checkTranslation.TOOLTIP_JSON_RECORD_FIELD: This widget requires only one JSON record to work hence It is recommended to apply a filter, in case of multiple records first record will be assumed
checkTranslation.MESSAGE_NO_NODES_LINKS: Nodes and Links not created by the given data!
